article:

I went to my room,   _   at how mean  my father was. It was obvious that he didn't   _   that I would die if I did not get the Pumpkin radio-controlled truck.

I   _   the packaging and looked at the top of the box--it was a Pumpkin truck. I had   _  ! I loved my parents! I felt like I could do anything! I could   _   get an A+ in English class.
